title: Infrared Behaviour of Massless Integrable Flows entering the Minimal Models from phi_31
abstract: It is known that any minimal model M_p receives along its phi_31 irrelevant direction *two* massless integrable flows: one from M_{p+1} perturbed by phi_{13}, the other from Z_{p-1} parafermionic model perturbed by its generating parafermion field. By comparing Thermodynamic Bethe Ansatz data and ``predictions'' of infrared Conformal Perturbation Theory we show that these two flows are received by M_p with opposite coupling constants of the phi_31 irrelevant perturbation. Some comments on the massless S matrices of these two flows are added.
